name: @elizaos/plugin-computeruse-root
description: Computer automation plugin for ElizaOS - enables AI agents to control the local machine (when supported) or a remote ComputerUse MCP server
author: elizaOS

scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && (python3 -m build 2>/dev/null || pyproject-build) || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: if [ -d typescript ]; then (cd typescript && vitest run); else echo 'TypeScript tests skipped (no typescript directory)'; fi
scripts.test:rust: if [ -d rust ]; then (cd rust && cargo test); else echo 'Rust tests skipped (no rust directory)'; fi
scripts.test:python: if [ -d python ]; then (cd python && pytest -p no:anchorpy --asyncio-mode=auto); else echo 'Python tests skipped (no python directory)'; fi
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint skipped'

COMPUTERUSE_MODE.description: Execution mode: auto | local | mcp (default: auto)

COMPUTERUSE_MCP_SERVER.description: MCP server name to use for remote control (default: computeruse)
